name: Aurelia Release Update - Late March Edition
description: As always, we're constantly working to improve Aurelia. Read on for the full list of minor and patch release update notes for our end-of-March releases.
content:
As always, we're constantly working to improve Aurelia. Read on for the full list of minor and patch release update notes for our end-of-March releases.

## Minor Releases

Minor updates include new features, updates to bugs and performance 

### [aurelia-pal-browser 1.2.0](https://github.com/aurelia/pal-browser/compare/1.1.0...v1.2.0)

#### Features

* Add flag to opt-out of IE support

### [aurelia-http-client 1.1.0](https://github.com/aurelia/http-client/compare/1.0.4...v1.1.0)

#### Features

* **request-builder:** add download progress callback ([a53869b](https://github.com/aurelia/http-client/commit/a53869b)), closes [#163](https://github.com/aurelia/http-client/issues/163)
* **request-builder:** add download progress callback ([73165dd](https://github.com/aurelia/http-client/commit/73165dd))

### [aurelia-templating 1.4.0](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/compare/1.3.0...v1.4.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* **aliases:** add missing filters and test ([5ac9981](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/5ac9981))
* **aliases:** filter aliases ([d00a7d0](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/d00a7d0))
* **aliases:** move to html-behavior ([b659b22](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/b659b22))
* **aliases:** place aliases on metadata ([24201fd](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/24201fd))
* **html-behavior:** remove extraneous filter ([4536135](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/4536135))
* **templating-engine:** enhanced views should attach ([5793d9c](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/5793d9c))

#### Features

* **alias:** process aliases for custom attributes ([7af0b42](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/7af0b42))
* **decorators:** customAttribute accepts aliases ([e03c929](https://github.com/aurelia/templating/commit/e03c929))

### [aurelia-i18n 1.4.0](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/compare/1.3.2...v1.4.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* **t:** expose configuration of aliases ([0e928ea](https://github.com/aurelia/i18n/commit/0e928ea))

### [aurelia-cli 0.27.0](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/compare/0.26.1...v0.27.0)

#### Bug Fixes

* **bluebird:** remove unnecessary Bluebird config in main file ([6fb5ee2](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/6fb5ee2)), closes [#534](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/issues/534)
* **build:** ensure that dependencies get in the correct bundle ([f4c9e8f](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/f4c9e8f))
* **file-system/logger:** don't use spread operator to support nodejs 4 ([ed6eb25](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/ed6eb25))
* **importer:** search for css files in root dir and resolve import error ([9a0da9e](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/9a0da9e))
* **project-template:** set baseDir to '.wwwroot' for ASP.NET Core projects ([c1e0401](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/c1e0401))
* **run:** don't ignore browserSync errors ([6518279](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/6518279))
* **test:** esling reports error that path should never be concated as string ([2b3f442](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/2b3f442))
* **typescript:** do not build typescript files in aurelia_project folder ([334df2f](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/334df2f))

#### Features

* **tests:** Enabled unit testing ([19c59a1](https://github.com/aurelia/cli/commit/19c59a1))

### [aurelia-ux 0.1.16](https://github.com/aurelia/ux/releases/tag/0.1.16)

#### Features

* Add ux-input component
* Add ux-textarea component

#### Bug Fixes

* Fix color name
* Fix textarea contains template

## Patch Releases

Patch updates include only fixes to bugs and performance improvements.

### [aurelia-polyfills 1.2.1](https://github.com/aurelia/polyfills/compare/1.2.0...v1.2.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **symbols:** check that descriptors is an object ([e181ff7](https://github.com/aurelia/polyfills/commit/e181ff7))

### [aurelia-fetch-client 1.1.2](https://github.com/aurelia/fetch-client/compare/1.1.1...v1.1.2)

#### Bug Fixes

* Fix blob serialization for undefined body.

### [aurelia-binding 1.2.1](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/compare/1.2.0...v1.2.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **AST:** pass lookupFunctions to all evaluate methods ([04e4e92](https://github.com/aurelia/binding/commit/04e4e92))

### [aurelia-loader-default 1.0.2](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-default/compare/1.0.1...v1.0.2)

#### Bug Fixes

* **index:** fix PLATFORM.eachModule for SystemJS[@0](https://github.com/0).20.x ([7c2c925](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-default/commit/7c2c925))

### [aurelia-loader-nodejs 1.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-nodejs/compare/1.0.0...v1.0.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **exports:** correct loader class name ([2a68ef9](https://github.com/aurelia/loader-nodejs/commit/2a68ef9))

### [aurelia-testing 1.0.0-beta.3.0.1](https://github.com/aurelia/testing/compare/1.0.0-beta.3.0.0...v1.0.0-beta.3.0.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **ComponentTester:** import missing waitFor function ([#60](https://github.com/aurelia/testing/issues/60)) ([1ecfbfe](https://github.com/aurelia/testing/commit/1ecfbfe))
* **ComponentTester:** withResources args are optional ([2154b8f](https://github.com/aurelia/testing/commit/2154b8f))

### [aurelia-logging 1.3.1](https://github.com/aurelia/logging/compare/1.3.0...v1.3.1)

#### Bug Fixes

* **logging:** restore ES5 compatibility ([70bb834](https://github.com/aurelia/logging/commit/70bb834))
